## Type of Change
<!-- Update the PR title to match one of these formats: -->

**Examples:**
- ✅ `[MINOR] Add humidity alerts`
- ✅ `[PATCH] Fix WiFi reconnection bug`
- ✅ `feat: add temperature threshold monitoring`
- ✅ `fix: correct negative temperature reading`

- [ ] `[MAJOR]` - Breaking changes (1.0.0 → 2.0.0)
- [ ] `[MINOR]` - New feature (1.0.0 → 1.1.0)
- [ ] `[PATCH]` - Bug fix (1.0.0 → 1.0.1)
- [ ] `[SKIP]` - Documentation/chore only (no release)

**Or use conventional commit format:**
- [ ] `feat:` - New feature (auto-detected as MINOR)
- [ ] `fix:` - Bug fix (auto-detected as PATCH)
- [ ] `docs:` - Documentation (auto-detected as SKIP)
- [ ] `chore:` - Maintenance (auto-detected as SKIP)
